name: For When I Return
description:
It's 3 am. Devil's hour.

Your friend is in the afterlife, but neither of you is safe from the devil right now.

Communicate across spiritual planes, Living and the Dead, and work together to crack the devil's cursed words before the top of the hour.

For When I Return is a Codename's inspired game where the only way to communicate with your partner is through ghost hunting equipment.

Currently only works if you're on the same network (or computer)

Made in 48 hours for the GGJ 2022
